backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining user profiles, listings, lobbies, and matches with access control and listing utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old nextId to the new state and initializes nextLobbyId to zero.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document containing the root mount point and script entry for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routes, global layout, theme provider, and profile/setup dialogs.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth flows and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard component that blocks access for unauthenticated users with a sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/components/background/Flyin: Three.js component rendering an animated PBR‑textured flying cow following a looping path.
frontend/src/components/background/NeonB: Wraps app content with a WebGL-detected 3D neon background, falling back to a static background when needed using Suspense and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/background/NeonS: Creates a Three.js scene with neon lighting, stars, pixel clouds, and animated cows, optimized with visibility-based rendering.
Renders drifting, twinkling neon-colored stars using a custom points geometry updated each frame.
frontend/src/components/background/Pixel: Displays drifting rotating pixel-art cloud planes with additive blending and per-frame motion updates.
frontend/src/components/images/ImageUrlF: Empty placeholder file for image URL-related components.
frontend/src/components/images/SafeImage: Empty placeholder file intended for a safe image-rendering component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright info and a link attribution including dynamic hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, login controls, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout combining header, footer, routed content, and the global neon background layer.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Empty placeholder for a listing card component.
Empty placeholder for listing filter controls.
Empty placeholder for a listing creation/edit form.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and saves their profile.
frontend/src/components/start/NeonStartS: Deprecated 2D canvas scene rendering animated sprites like UFOs, cows, and sparks for a legacy start screen.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudioContextM: React hook managing streamed music via Web Audio API with intensity-based volume and playback control.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudioContextS: Web Audio–based SFX hook providing oscillator and filtered sound effects with throttling and cleanup.
frontend/src/game/audio/useBeatClock.ts: Beat clock hook that tracks beat phase and timing using AudioContext for rhythm‑synced effects.
Empty file placeholder for a future chiptune loop hook.
frontend/src/game/audio/useMusicTrack.ts: Simple HTMLAudioElement music hook controlling looped playback and mute handling.
frontend/src/game/audio/useSfx.ts: HTMLAudioElement‑based SFX system with caching, throttling, and optional stereo panning via Web Audio API.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Defines core game constants for grid layout, scoring, entity behavior, and planet effects.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useGameLoop.ts: Main game loop hook managing state updates, rendering, spawning, movement, and gameplay intensity.
frontend/src/game/render/canvasDpr.ts: Utility for setting canvas resolution based on device pixel ratio and retrieving logical size.
frontend/src/game/render/entities.ts: Rendering helpers for snakes and crocodiles with toon shading, animations, and beat‑synced effects.
frontend/src/game/render/obstacles.ts: Defines rendering routines for UFOs and cows using toon materials, glow effects, beat‑synced motion, and texture fallbacks.
frontend/src/game/render/sprites.ts: Provides optional sprite loading and helper functions to draw whole sprites or frames onto a canvas.
frontend/src/game/render/starfield.ts: Implements a starfield renderer with twinkling stars, a gradient background, and periodic shooting stars with glowing trails.
frontend/src/game/render/toonMaterials.t: Loads toon texture assets and defines toon materials with colors, outlines, and glow properties for various objects.
frontend/src/game/render/toonRenderer.ts: Implements the core toon renderer, offering glow, outline, fill, and gradient utilities with adjustable quality settings.
frontend/src/game/render/vfx.ts: Renders laser beams, explosions, and score popups using layered glow, pulsing effects, and time‑based animation.
frontend/src/game/skins/catalog.ts: Defines a catalog of snake skins with IDs, names, descriptions, and color schemes.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for game entities including snakes, planets, power-ups, obstacles, bosses, and full game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsHintOverlay: Renders an overlay card showing keyboard, mobile, and gamepad control hints.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameHUD.tsx: Displays score, level, eliminations, and planet/gravity badges using game state data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns the current authenticated identity and user profile with loading and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentVisibility: Tracks and returns whether the document is currently visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, theme variables, fonts, and neon-themed utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/audio/AudioDir: Manages audio intensity states and triggers sound events based on gameplay intensity.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/input/useAnalo: Hook that merges keyboard and virtual joystick input into a normalized analog vector, acceleration, brake, and shake flags.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/input/VirtualJ: Touch-only virtual joystick that tracks finger position, normalizes movement, and feeds analog input to the game.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/MotorSnakeGame: Sets up the 3D game canvas, game logic systems, virtual joystick, HUD overlays, and debug panels.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/multiplayer/Mu: Bridge for submitting local actions and logging remote actions, placeholder for multiplayer syncing.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/render/SphereW: Three.js scene with rotating core, fog, sphere environment, and optional abyss tentacles.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/state/gameStat: Zustand store defining all game entities, world settings, power-ups, and state mutation actions.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/Anomal: Spawns anomalies and updates active power-ups, applying effects like black hole suction and shooting star behavior.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/Collis: Detects collisions with enemies, anomalies, and the core, triggering VFX, power-ups, or entity removal.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/EnemyS: Periodically spawns enemies around the player and updates their movement based on velocity.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/Enviro: Cycles gravity, applies acid rain damage, and manages wind portals and fog intensity changes.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/GhostS: Tracks ghost activation after player deaths and increases its influence until replacement triggers.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/Player: Updates player velocity and position using analog input, speed modifiers, smoothing, and aggressive movement behavior.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/TailSy: Updates tail segments to follow the player, handles whip impulse, and removes baby penguins on shake.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/WorldS: Constrains the player to inside/outside sphere surfaces and manages abyss mode and core break events.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/DebugSpawnP: UI panel for spawning enemies and anomalies and displaying baby penguin count.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/DebugWorldC: UI for toggling world mode and triggering a core break with automatic recovery.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/Environment: Debug UI for gravity readout, fog adjustment, acid rain trigger, and shield toggling.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/GhostOverla: Displays ghost influence meter and a temporary subtitle when the ghost activates.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/PowerUpStat: Shows active power‑up info, progress bar, warnings, and remaining duration.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/VfxBus.ts: Simple event bus for triggering VFX events with listeners.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/VfxLayer3D: Renders temporary 3D visual effects in response to VFX bus events.
frontend/src/multiplayer/useLobby.ts: React hooks for creating, joining, leaving, and polling lobbies via backend actor.
Handles sending match actions and polling match state and action history.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, navigation buttons, and feature descriptions for the game.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a mock leaderboard with top player rankings, icons, and a placeholder for personal best scores.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailsPage.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Provides UI for starting solo play, creating or joining multiplayer lobbies, and viewing available lobbies.
frontend/src/pages/MyListingsPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PlayPage.tsx: Renders the main game view with audio controls, pause/resume logic, and multiplayer event handling.
frontend/src/pages/SellListingPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SkinsPage.tsx: Shows a grid of snake skins with ownership and equip states, using mock data and placeholder backend integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility methods for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Defines project goals for rebuilding a new 3D Motor Snake game with spherical world, async multiplayer, and environmental systems, while noting prior deployment issues. Lists existing features, requirements, and architectural notes guiding the foundational redesign.
